title: Khloe Kardashian shares adorable new snaps of daughter True beaming at camera
text:

Reality sensation Khloe Kardashian has dropped one of the most heartwarming albums on her Instagram .

The 35 year-old, younger sister of Kourtney and Kim Kardashian , snapped her one year-old daughter True Thompson smiling widely as she clapped her hands.

It seems Khloe took adorable True out for some mother-daughter time to a pier.

She captioned the pics: "My TuTu."

Khloe shares True with ex Tristan Thompson, but the two broke off their relationship after Tristan was seen snogging Jordyn Woods at a party.

Jordyn, 21, is seven years Tristan's junior, and just happens to be the ex-BFF of Khloe's half sister, Kylie Jenner .

(Image: Getty Images North America)

Khloe recently gave a candid interview about her private life and where she stands on Tristan.

Speaking on Jay Shetty's On Purpose podcast, Khloe revealed: "About eight months ago, I had a breakup and so figuring out, I think people are so good at distracting and I've really chosen to not distract myself or try to not distract myself.

"Maybe people would say True would be a distraction, but if anything, she's a healthy distraction."

(Image: khloe kardashian/Instagram)

(Image: Getty Images)

The star added: "I haven't jumped into dating. I don't care to date right now. I'm not in a rush for it. I feel so good in my life and I don't need much else."

Despite her strength in herself, brother-in-law and rapping legend Kanye West was rumoured to be trying to set up Khloe with Hollywood hearth throb Brad Pitt.

Kanye, who's married to Khloe's sister Kim, hosted Brad at one of his famous Sunday Services.

Khloe was there too, and has never hidden her affection for the blond hunk.

She said on The Howerd Stern Show: "Bring in Brad Pitt and I'll f**k him on air."
description: Khloe snapped her one year old daughter clapping and with a big grin on her face during a day out to a pier
